display.title: Transmutation with Experience
display.description: An Experience Infuser Structure Kit can be made by dropping a Stone Saw & Hammer, Cauldron, Amethyst Block & Solidified Experience onto a Fletching Table [Required: 1x Stone Saw & Hammer 1x Cauldron 1x Amethyst Block 1x Solidified Experience | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
